comment: Great teacher, with complicated assignments. Three papers and a group project, but the topics for the papers are easy. Study and write the papers, and you'll pass easily.

I hated this class. Attendance is mandatory. Be prepared to do a lot of homework. She liked a lot of class participation. Her essay topics were very hard to write about. And she was never the helpful.

Her lectures can sometimes confuse you, but she's dead on with her writing support.  Every essay you get back she has labored over, and it's always full of helpful remarks, constructive criticism about what's wrong, and (most importantly) encouraging comments about what you've done right.  I'm still looking for a 1102 professor that is as good.
she likes certain people hates others...if ur a really good brown noser go for it. it is a really hard to get in touch with her too

Gives only 3 essays and a group project the whole semester. Attendance is mandatory. Low useage of the book. Unclear though at times of what she expects. REALLY slow grader and sometimes confusing to how she grades. Doesn't answer emails and is a poor communicator.

Good teacher. If you ask her for help with a paper she will help you a lot. She teaches at KSU and another college so she grades pretty slow. gives 3 essays and 2 timed writings. many people didnt do too well on her essays. she takes high regard to class parcipation and effort. not the best, not nearly the worst. i would take her again.
